alert.note: Alert for Adams; Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:00PM MDT until June 29 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... Central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Strasburg, or 35 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Leader and Hoyt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
